display.title: HSS-G Coils
description: &&aHSS-G Coils&&r bring up the Heat Capacity to &&d5,400K&&r.
The ever-tempting &&6Coil bonuses&&r&&r should be high incentive to make those early, as they become mandatory only during &&dLuV&&r.
At this point, you may find yourself using only one &&3Electric Blast Furnace&&r for your entire base, powered with the highest available Voltage you can supply.

&&6Hot Metals&&r will start taking longer to cool down, as unlike your EBFs, the &&3Vacuum Freezer&&r doesn't get perfect overclocks. For that, you probably want a dual &&7(or quad)&&r &&3Vacuum Freezer&&r.
